channel.title: Booleans :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides In Python, Boolean values are stored in the bool data type. Variables of the bool data type can only store one of two values, True or False. So, a Boolean value is really the simplest data value we can imagine - it is a single binary bit representing a value of True or False.
